SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID

AND R.ADDTIME >= #{beginTime}
AND R.ADDTIME <= concat(#{endTime},' 23:59:59')

SELECT FR.ORDERNUM, FR.FIRST_BORROW_ID, FR.USE_MONEY, RM.USERNAME,
FROM T_FIRST_TRANSFER FT INNER JOIN T_FIRST_TENDER_REAL FR ON FR.ID = FT.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID LEFT JOIN ROCKY_MEMBER RM ON RM.ID = FT.USER_ID WHERE FT.ID = #{transferId}

SELECT FT.ID, FT.ACCOUNT_REAL, FT.AWARDS, FT.MANAGE_FEE, FT.SUCCESS_TIME, FT.ADD_TIME, R.ADDTIME AS firstOpenTime, R.ORDERNUM FROM T_FIRST_TRANSFER FT,t_first_tender_real r
AND FT.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID = R.ID
AND R.ADDTIME >= #{beginTime}
AND R.ADDTIME <= concat(#{endTime},' 23:59:59')
ORDER BY FT.SUCCESS_TIME DESC
ORDER BY FT.ADD_TIME DESC
ORDER BY R.ADDTIME DESC

SELECT C.USER_ID,C.BORROW_ID,M.USERNAME,MS.USERNAME AS SUBSCRIBE_USERNAME,C.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID AS TENDER_REAL_ID,FS.USER_ID as subUserId,
FROM ROCKY_B_COLLECTIONRECORD C INNER JOIN T_FIRST_SUBSCRIBE FS ON FS.NEW_FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID = c.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID AND FS.STATUS = 3 INNER JOIN T_FIRST_TENDER_REAL R ON R.ID = FS.NEW_FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID INNER JOIN T_FIRST_TRANSFER FT ON FT.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID = FS.OLD_FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID AND FT.`STATUS` = 4 INNER JOIN ROCKY_MEMBER M ON M.ID = FT.USER_ID INNER JOIN ROCKY_MEMBER MS ON MS.ID = FS.USER_ID WHERE C.ID = #{collectionId}

FROM T_FIRST_TRANSFER FT INNER JOIN T_FIRST_SUBSCRIBE FS ON FT.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID = FS.OLD_FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID AND FS.STATUS = 3 INNER JOIN T_FIRST_TENDER_REAL FR ON FR.ID = FS.NEW_FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID INNER JOIN ROCKY_MEMBER M ON M.ID = FT.USER_ID INNER JOIN ROCKY_MEMBER MS ON MS.ID = FS.USER_ID WHERE FT.`STATUS` = 4 AND FS.NEW_FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID = #{firstTenderRealId}
